name: Momentum Redirect
description:
Momentum Redirect is a challenging platformer where your movement is a little bit different than normal:

  • Jumping, instead of propelling you upwards, converts your horizontal momentum into vertical momentum, meaning the faster you run, the higher you jump.
  • Every consecutive wall jump increases your speed, so stringing together wall jumps allows you to go very fast.
  • There is functionally no speed limit, so you can zoom around to your heart's content.

Momentum Redirect includes:

  • 5 levels filled with platforming challenges
  • 5 hidden collectable hats
  • Lore drawn all over the walls
  • A built in speedrun timer
  • OST by Eraser_Cat

OST is on soundcloud at https://soundcloud.com/user-954841963/sets/momentum-redirect-ost
